name: gllm
description: gllm is a powerful CLI tool designed to interact seamlessly with various Large Language Models (LLMs). Supports features like interactive chat, multi-turn conversations, file attachments, search integration, command agent, multi-agents workflow, deep research, and extensive customization.

name: copilot_sidebar
description: A Chrome extension that enhances your productivity by allowing you to extract web content and build custom prompts for AI models, all from a convenient sidebar.

name: clash_forge
description: A user-friendly multi-batch tool to streamline proxy configurations for Clash. Convert subscriptions and proxy URLs into Clash-compatible YAML files with automated tasks and clear feedback. Supports vless, vmess, trojan and ss protocols.

name: SakanaVision
description: Sakana Vision - 日本語の自動翻訳ツール a Node version of the Japanese-to-English translation tool. Translate text in any active window with simple keyboard shortcuts without switching applications. Supports customizable prompts to fit to any translation task and text extraction.

name: speechie
description: A lightweight chrome extension that makes tts easy. Select text on the web and press Alt+T to trigger text-to-speech.

name: SakanaLens
description: Sakana Lens 日本語の自動翻訳ツール a Python version of the Japanese-to-English translation tool. Seamlessly translate on-screen text in any window with customizable keyboard shortcuts.

name: GVoice
description: A lightweight, desktop Text-to-Speech (TTS) application powered by Google AI's Gemini TTS API. Convert your text to natural-sounding speech effortlessly with support for multiple voices choice,  and customizable speech styles.

name: KokoroVoice
description: A lightweight, local Text-to-Speech engine powered by Kokoro TTS. Convert text to natural-sounding speech without token limits or subscription costs.
